item.title: MIUI V13.0.3.0.SLLCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Civi 2 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Civi 2 China

Codename: ziyi

Version: V13.0.3.0.SLLCNXM | 12.0

[Camera]
Optimization: Image quality for specific scenes
Fix: Overall stability issues
[Other]
Fix: Charging icon didn't appear when charger was connected in some cases
